title: Boat likely to go public next year: cofounder Aman Gupta
description: Wearables brand Boat is likely to list on the public markets next year, cofounder Aman Gupta said at the ET Soonicorns Summit in Bengaluru.
content: Wearables brand Boat is likely to list on the public markets next year, cofounder Aman Gupta said at the ET Soonicorns Summit in Bengaluru.
